fields.summary: hadoop-hdfs-native-client fails distro build when trying to copy libhdfs binaries.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

fields.description:

This message was automatically generated.
Thanks for the find+fix Brahma! Patch LGTM. I do not have a Windows env to test, but will trust you on this one :)
Thanks again Brahma for the find and fix, committed to trunk.
HADOOP-12892 was backported to branch-2 and branch-2.8, so this commit should be backported as well. What do you think, [~brahmareddy] and [~andrew.wang]?
[~ajisakaa], you are correct.  I cherry-picked it to branch-2 and branch-2.8.  I confirmed that both branches build the distro successfully on Windows.
For future git log greppers, I forgot to put the JIRA ID in the commit message. My mistake.
